objectives: Identify and recall key vocabulary related to computer problems
Understand main ideas in conversations about computer problems
learning_style_adaptations: Use of diagrams, charts, and mind maps

multiple_intelligences.linguistic: Write a story or essay about computer problems
multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about computer problems
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of computer problems
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to computer problems
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about computer problems
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss computer problems
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to computer problems
multiple_intelligences.naturalistic: Categorize and classify concepts related to computer problems

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about computer problems
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about computer problems
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about computer problems

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Well-lit space with visual displays and projection capabilities

warm_up.description: Students examine images related to computer problems and discuss

main_activities.learning_style_adaptation: Use of diagrams, charts, and mind maps
main_activities.description: Students receive information about computer problems through visual modality
Students practice language related to computer problems using visual approach
Students produce original content about computer problems demonstrating basic thinking

discussion_prompts: What do you know about computer problems?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for computer problems
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to computer problems

homework_options.required: Core assignment at basic level using visual approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

common_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge about computer problems
Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
